title: Edge, 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with twist return
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Band of Point d'Alençon with a design of chinoiserie-inspired structures as well as birds, butterflies and foliated branches. Fond: réseau. Modes: réseau mouché, portes, gaze quadrillée, bride tortillée.

tombstone.epitaph:
Edge, 18th century.
